query.text: Load full pancake-making simulation data from library

query.q: simact_contact(T, knowrob_sim:'TouchingSituation', knowrob:'Cup', Obj), simact_start(T,Start), simact_end(T, End).
query.text: In which contact intervals was the Cup involved?

query.q: simlift_liftonly(knowrob:'Cup', Start, End), add_trajectory_sim('Cup', Start, End, 0.1,3,'lime').
query.text: When was the Cup lifted from the KitchenTable? Visualize trajectory.

query.q: simflip_full(knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), add_trajectory_sim('Spatula', Start, End, 0.1,0,'fuchsia').
query.text: Visualize trajectory of the Spatula while flipping the pancake

query.q: simact(T, knowrob:'GraspingSomething'), rdf_has(T, knowrob:'objectActedOn', Obj), rdf_has(Obj, rdf:type, knowrob:'Spatula'), simact_start(T, Start), simact_end(T, End), add_trajectory_sim('Spatula', Start, End, 0.1,0,'maroon').
query.text: When was the Spatula being held in Hand? Visualize trajectory.

query.q: simflip_fliponly(knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), add_trajectory_sim('LiquidTangibleThing', Start, End, 0.1,2,'aqua').
query.text: Visualize trajectory of the Pancake while it's on the Spatula

query.q: simflip_full(knowrob:'LiquidTangibleThing', knowrob:'Spatula', knowrob:'PancakeMaker', Start, End, _, _, _), add_trajectory_sim('LiquidTangibleThing', Start, End, 0.1,2,'blue').
query.text: Visualize trajectory of the Pancake for the whole flipping interval

query.q: rdf_has(_, knowrob:'experimentName', literal(type(_, Expname))), string_concat(Expname, ' Timeline', Title), findall(Type, (simact(T), rdf_split_url(_,Type,T)), X), sim_timeline_val(X, Times), add_diagram(diagram_id2, 'Title', timeline, 'Time', 'Events', 300, 300, '12px', [[['X'],['Times']]]).
query.text: Show event timeline in the chart
